testsuite.name: com.grailsinaction.PostControllerSpec

testcase.name: Get a users timeline given their id
Check that non-existent users are handled with an error
Adding a valid new post to the timeline
Adding an invalid new post to the timeline
Testing id of joe_cool redirects to /users/joe_cool
Testing id of null redirects to /users/chuck_norris
Exercising security filter for unauthenticated user
